entities.description: A section focusing on depressive symptoms experienced by adolescents.
The period during which the respondent felt discouraged about how things were going in life.
The worst problem experienced by the respondent.
A state where the respondent has lost interest in enjoyable things.
A state where the respondent feels like nothing was fun even when good things were happening.
Changes in eating habits during the worst period, such as eating less or more than usual.
The respondent eating less than usual almost every day.
The respondent eating more than usual almost every day.

relationships.description: Relates adolescent depression to the period where discouragement was felt.
Relates the period of discouragement to experiencing the worst problem.
Indicates that during the adolescent depression period, the respondent experienced loss of interest.
Indicates that during the adolescent depression period, the respondent felt like nothing was fun.
Relates adolescent depression to changes in eating habits.
Indicates that changes in eating habits include eating less than usual.
Indicates that changes in eating habits include eating more than usual.

triplets.subject: Adolescent
triplets.object: how things were going in life

triplets.subject: Adolescent
triplets.object: felt discouraged about life every day

triplets.subject: Adolescent
triplets.object: even when good things were happening
